item.title: The Foundations of Righteousness
item.description:
The Foundations of Righteousness by President Spencer W. Kimball, President of the Church given in the Saturday Morning session of the 147th Semiannual General Conference on Fri Sep 30 1977
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone.
